name: DarkRPG 汉化
extra-info: 在整合包 7.9.1hf2 版本上测试可用

replacements.replace: Welcome Back! (Press L for Quests, O for Origin info, /trigger.. to RTP/Spawn, M for Worldmap, C for Zoom) Happy Exploring!
replacements.to: 欢迎回来！（按L以打开任务，O以打开起源信息，/trigger..以随机传送/返回出生点，M以打开地图，C以缩放。）开心地探索吧！

replacements.replace: Click Here To Get Your Server
replacements.to: 点击这里来获取你的专属服务器

replacements.replace: Click Here For Modpack & Server Info
replacements.to: 点击这里来查看整合包和服务器信息

replacements.replace: Your adapted lungs allows you to hold your breath underwater for up to 8 minutes.
replacements.to: 你适应良好的肺让你能在水下憋气，时间长达8分钟。

replacements.replace: Primary: Torpedo yourself forward with great speed in the water.
replacements.to: 主要技能：在水中以极快的速度冲刺，如同发射的鱼雷

replacements.replace: Due to the nature of your kind, you slowly dry out on land. the Water Protection enchantment will reduce its effects to some point.
replacements.to: 由于你的种族特性，你会在陆地上慢慢变干。防水附魔能在一定程度上减少脱水的影响。

replacements.replace: Secondary: Emit an ultrasonic pulse, allowing you to see the location of nearby entities, even through walls!
replacements.to: 次要技能: 发出一段超声波脉冲, 即使隔着墙也能让你定位附近的实体。

replacements.replace: You have evolved to only be able to eat fish.
replacements.to: 你已经进化得只能以鱼类为食。

replacements.replace: Your species is naturally more fragile, sacrificing hardiness for underwater mobility. You only have 8 hearts.
replacements.to: 牺牲强健的体魄换取水下的灵敏，这使得你的种族天生更脆弱。你只有8颗心的生命值。

replacements.replace: RTP cannot be triggered while slow falling is active...
replacements.to: 缓降激活时无法触发随机TP……

replacements.replace: tp not allowed in this dimension...
A dark mage has teleported you to a random location...
replacements.to: 一名暗黑法师将你传送到了一个随机的位置……

replacements.replace: Getting all that wool sheared is quite the effort, and tends to drain your hunger.
replacements.to: 剪掉所有的羊毛是很费劲的，往往能耗空你的饥饿值。

replacements.replace: You can be sheared, and your soft wool cushions falls, causing you to bounce a bit.
replacements.to: 你柔软的羊绒可以被剪下来，导致你小跳一下。

replacements.replace: You can only eat grasses and vegetarian-friendly foods.
Shaking out your fluff will allow you to see your current wool color.
replacements.to: 抖抖身上松软的毛毛能让你看见你现在的毛色。

replacements.replace: Close kin of the sheep, you are especially fluffy
replacements.to: 羊的近亲，你特别的毛茸茸

replacements.replace: You converted Rotten Flesh into Diamond
replacements.to: 你刚才将腐肉转化成了钻石

replacements.replace: Kill a Bee. Reward: 30 Exp, 15x Honey Bottles, 1x Diamond Sword, 10x Red Wool.
replacements.to: 杀死蜜蜂。奖励：30经验值，15个蜂蜜瓶，1把钻石剑，10个红色羊毛。
收集20个下界石英。奖励：85经验值。
制造1个末影箱。奖励：100经验值。
获得1个鞘翅。奖励：200经验值。

replacements.replace: Kill a Strider. Reward: 320 Exp, 10x Amethyst Shards.
replacements.to: 击杀炽足兽。奖励：320经验值，10个紫水晶碎片。

replacements.replace: Craft a Pink Bed using Pink Wool.  Reward: 5 Exp, 2x Shulker Boxes.
replacements.to: 用粉红色羊毛制作粉红色床。奖励：5经验值，2个潜影盒。

replacements.replace: Gather 10x Coarse Dirt.  Reward: 120 Exp, 50x Rooted Dirt.
replacements.to: 收集10个砂土。奖励：120经验值，50个缠根泥土。

replacements.replace: These are extra quests that can be completed in any order.
replacements.to: 这些是额外的任务，这些任务可以以任意顺序完成。

replacements.replace: Fill an empty Bucket with Water.  Reward: 5 Exp, 1x Chainmal Helmet, 50x Arrows.
replacements.to: 把空桶装满水。奖励：5经验值，1个锁链头盔，50支箭。

replacements.replace: Gather Netherite scraps and make 4x Netherite Ingots.  Reward: 100 Exp, 1x Netherite Boots, 2x Experience Bottles.
replacements.to: 收集下界合金碎片，并制作4个下界合金锭。奖励：65经验值，1个下界合金靴子，20个黄绿色染色玻璃。

replacements.replace: Obtain all 4 pieces of Diamond Armor.  Reward: 150 Exp
replacements.to: 集齐钻石盔甲的4件套。奖励：150经验值。

replacements.replace: Craft a Wooden Hoe.  Reward: 10 Exp, 30x Oak Fence.
replacements.to: 制作木锄。奖励：10经验值，30个橡木栅栏。

replacements.replace: Assault a tree, gather resources, make a Crafting Table.  Reward: 20 Exp, 10x Sticks.
replacements.to: 砍树，收集资源，制造工作台。奖励：20经验值，10根木棍。
制作1个石头按钮。奖励：65经验值。

replacements.replace: Kill More Zombies, Collect 45x Rotten Flesh.  Reward: 375 Exp, 50x Arrows, 5x Diamonds.
replacements.to: 击杀更多僵尸，并收集45个腐肉。奖励：375经验值，50支箭，5颗钻石。
制作1个灵魂营火。奖励：100经验值。

replacements.replace: Fish and catch 5x Raw Cod.  Reward: 5 Exp, 1x Turtle Helm.
replacements.to: 通过钓鱼得到5生鳕鱼。奖励：5经验值，1个海龟头盔。
制造1个书架。奖励：40经验值。
制造1个圆石墙，奖励：30经验值。
制作3个钻石块。奖励：70经验值。

replacements.replace: Get an Iron Ingot.  Reward: 15 Exp, 1x Golden Pickaxe, 1x Flint.
replacements.to: 获得铁锭。奖励：15经验值，1把金稿，1个燧石。

replacements.replace: Craft a Chest.  Reward: 10 Exp, 6x Copper Ingots, 1x Chest.
replacements.to: 制造箱子。奖励：10经验值，6个铜锭，1个箱子。

replacements.replace: Travel to The End, Kill Endermen.  Reward: 220 Exp, 20x Bread, 15x Apples.
replacements.to: 抵达末地，杀死末影人。奖励：220经验值，20个面包，15个苹果。
制造1个骨块。奖励：50经验值。

replacements.replace: Kill Spiders, Collect 3x Spider Eyes.  Reward: 100 Exp, 35x Bread, 20 Apples, 1x Diamond Pickaxe.
replacements.to: 击杀蜘蛛，并收集3个蜘蛛眼。奖励：100经验值，35个面包，20个苹果，1个钻石稿。

replacements.replace: Craft 6x Smooth Stone Slabs.  Rewards: 30 Exp.
replacements.to: 制作6个平滑石头台阶。奖励：30经验值。
收集64个烈焰棒。奖励：130经验值。

replacements.replace: This is the main story quest chain. Completing each goal will unlock harder quests in this series.
replacements.to: 这是主要的故事任务线。完成某些任务后将解锁这个系列中更难的任务。
制作1个岩浆块。奖励：70经验值。

replacements.replace: Craft 4x Cracked Stone Bricks.  Rewards: 50 Exp.
replacements.to: 制造4个裂纹石砖，奖励：50经验值。

replacements.replace: Hurt a Panda.  Reward: 10 Exp, 10x Slime Balls
replacements.to: 伤害熊猫。奖励：10经验值，10粘液球。

replacements.replace: Craft a Red Banner.  Reward: 40 Exp, 1x Shield
replacements.to: 制作红色旗帜。奖励：40经验值，1个盾牌。

replacements.replace: Gather 10x Mycelium.  Reward: 120 Exp, 50x Crimson Nylium, 50x Warped Nylium.
replacements.to: 收集10个菌丝。奖励：120经验值，50个绯红菌岩，50个诡异菌岩。
制作5个梯子。奖励：30经验值。

replacements.replace: Gather 60x End Stone Bricks.  Reward: 200 Exp, 50x Glass, 10x Eye of the Ender.
replacements.to: 收集60个末地石砖。奖励：200经验值，50个玻璃，10个末影之眼。

replacements.replace: Craft an Oak Boat.  Reward: 10 Exp, 1x Iron Boots
replacements.to: 制作橡木船。奖励：10经验值，1个铁靴子。
制作1个铁靴子。奖励：50经验值。

replacements.replace: Craft a Red Bed.  Reward: 45 Exp, 10x Torches, 1x Diamond Axe.
replacements.to: 制作红色床。奖励：45经验值，10个火把，1把钻石斧。
制造25个金粒。奖励：80经验值。

replacements.replace: Gather 50x Raw Copper.  Reward: 80 Exp, 35x Brown Wool, 1x Diamond Sword, 1x Gold Pickaxe, 60x Arrows, 1x Crossbow
replacements.to: 收集50个粗铜。奖励：80经验值，35个棕色羊毛，1把钻石剑，1把金镐，60支箭，1把弩。

replacements.replace: Get a Warped Fungus.  Reward: 50 Exp, 1x Netherite Sword.
replacements.to: 获得诡异菌。奖励：50经验值，1把下界合金剑。
制作1个铁活板门。奖励：65经验值。

replacements.replace: Kill Zombies, Collect 9x Rotten Flesh.  Reward: 50 Exp, 1x Chainmail Chestplate, 1x Crossbow, 1x Diamond.
replacements.to: 击杀僵尸，并收集9个腐肉。奖励：50经验值，1个锁链胸甲，1把弩，1颗钻石。

replacements.replace: Craft 1x Nether Wart Block.  Rewards: 70 Exp.
replacements.to: 制作1个下界疣块。奖励：70经验值。
制作16个铁栏杆。奖励：30经验值。
制作3个玻璃瓶。奖励：65经验值。

replacements.replace: Get a Copper Ingot.  Reward: 15 Exp, 1x Golden Sword.
replacements.to: 得到铜锭。奖励：15经验值，1把金剑。
制造6个黑石墙。奖励：70经验值。
制作2个拉杆。奖励：65经验值。

replacements.replace: Gather 2x Crimson Fungus.  Reward: 25 Exp, 1x Iron Shovel, 10x Cooked Salmon.
replacements.to: 收集2个绯红菌。奖励：25经验值，1个铁锹，10个熟鲑鱼。

replacements.replace: Craft 2x Red Nether Bricks.  Rewards: 85 Exp.
replacements.to: 制作2个红色下界砖块。奖励：85经验值。
可远观不可亵玩焉（任务）
收集10个仙人掌。奖励：120经验值，50粘土块。

replacements.replace: Get 2x Dirt.  Reward: 5 Exp, 1x Wooden Pickaxe.
replacements.to: 获得2个泥土。奖励：5经验值，1个木镐。

replacements.replace: Collect 2x Gold Ingots.  Reward: 15 Exp, 5x Golden Apples, 1x Anvil.
replacements.to: 收集2个金锭。奖励：15经验值，5个金苹果，1个铁砧。

replacements.replace: Make a Campfire.  Reward: 10 Exp, 7x Cooked Rabbit, 50x Green Wool.
replacements.to: 制造营火。奖励：10经验值，7个烤兔肉，50个绿色羊毛。

replacements.replace: Hunt cows for 1x Raw Beef.  Reward: 15 Exp, 10x Honey Bottles, 10x Beetroot Soup.
replacements.to: 杀死牛并获得1个生牛肉。奖励：15经验值，10个蜂蜜瓶，10碗甜菜汤。

replacements.replace: Hunt some sheep for 1x White Wool.  Reward: 5 Exp, 50x Pink Wool, 3x Cactus, 1x Bucket.
replacements.to: 通过击杀一些羊来获得1个羊毛。奖励：5经验值，50个粉红色羊毛，3个仙人掌，1个桶。
是时候让这里变亮了！（任务）
制作8个火把。奖励：30经验值。

replacements.replace: Craft an Armor Stand.  Reward: 5 Exp, 25 Oak Planks, 1 Oak Sign, 1 Oak Door.
replacements.to: 制造盔甲架。奖励：5经验值，25个橡木木板，1个橡木告示牌，1个橡木门。
修复，重命名以及合成！（任务）
制造1个铁砧。奖励：65经验值。

replacements.replace: Kill Skeletons, Collect 20x Bones.  Reward: 100 Exp, 25x Pumpkin Pie, 5x Leather.
replacements.to: 击杀骷髅，并收集20根骨头。奖励：100经验值，25个南瓜派，5个皮革。

replacements.replace: (Final Easy Quest) Craft a Nether Portal and Kill a Piglin in the Nether.  Reward: 1000 Exp, 10x Diamonds, 1x Green Dye, 1x Yellow Dye, 1x Blue Dye, 1x Pink Dye, 1x Orange Dye, 1x Cyan Dye, 5 Torches.
replacements.to: （简单任务完结）制作下界传送门，并在下界杀死猪灵。奖励：1000经验值，10颗钻石，1个绿色染料，1个黄色染料，1个蓝色染料，1个粉红色染料，1个橙色染料，1个青色染料，5个火把。

replacements.replace: Mine Obsidian.  Reward: 50 Exp, 1x Iron Sword, 1x Iron Helm.
replacements.to: 挖黑曜石。奖励：50经验值，1把铁剑，1个铁头盔。

replacements.replace: Use an empty bucket and fill up with Cod.  Reward: 20 Exp, 5x Golden Apples.
replacements.to: 用一个空桶来装鳕鱼。奖励：20经验值，5个金苹果。

replacements.replace: Kill More Skeletons, Collect 50x Bones.  Reward: 500 Exp, 30 Apples, 20 Carrots, 5x Coal.
replacements.to: 击杀更多骷髅，并收集50个骨头。奖励：500经验值，30个苹果，20个胡萝卜，5个煤炭。
美味可爱的岩浆怪（任务）

replacements.replace: Kill Magma Cubes, Collect 60x Magma Cream.  Reward: 1000 Exp, 5x Totem of Undying.
replacements.to: 杀死岩浆怪，并收集60个岩浆膏。奖励：1000经验值，5个不死图腾。
制造1个蜂蜜瓶。奖励：80经验值。

replacements.replace: Use a Bucket of Water to catch an Axolotl.  Reward: 200 Exp, 1x Grindstone.
replacements.to: 用水桶抓住美西螈。奖励：200经验值，1个砂轮。

replacements.replace: Travel to The End, Kill Endermen and collect 10x Ender Pearls.  Reward: 550 Exp, 20x Gold Ingots.
replacements.to: 前往末地，杀死末影人并收集10个末影珍珠。奖励：550经验值，20个金锭。
收集30根木棍。奖励：30经验值。

replacements.replace: Gather 10x Melons.  Reward: 120 Exp, 50x Moss Block.
replacements.to: 收集10个西瓜。奖励：120经验值，50个苔藓块。

replacements.replace: Gather 10x Grass Blocks.  Reward: 120 Exp, 50x Gravel.
replacements.to: 收集10个草方块。奖励：120经验值，50个沙砾。
制作2个下界砖块。奖励：70经验值。
制造1个荧石。奖励：70经验值。

replacements.replace: Craft a Netherite Shovel.  Reward: 65 Exp, 1x Netherite Boots, 2x Experience Bottles.
replacements.to: 制作一个下界合金锹。奖励：65经验值，1个下界合金靴，2个附魔之瓶。

replacements.replace: Smelt Chorus Fruits into Popped Chorus Fruit and obtain x4 of them.  Rewards: 150 Exp.
replacements.to: 冶炼4个紫颂果成爆裂紫颂果。奖励：150经验值。

replacements.replace: Mine some Cobblestone, Use a Furnace and make 5x Stone.  Reward: 30 Exp, 1x Fishing Rod, 1x Bow, 30x Arrows.
replacements.to: 挖一些圆石，用熔炉烧制5个石头。奖励：30经验值，1根钓鱼竿，1把弓，30支箭。
收集40个腐肉。奖励：50经验值。
制造3个砂土.奖励：70经验值。

replacements.replace: Craft 5x Chests.  Reward: 20 Exp, 1x Pink Shulker Box.
replacements.to: 制作5个箱子。奖励：20经验值，1个粉红色潜影盒。

replacements.replace: What Did You Have For Dinner? (Quest)

replacements.to: 收集1个龙息。奖励：100经验值。

replacements.replace: Craft a Wooden Sword.  Reward: 5 Exp, 30x Oak Planks, 2x Bowls.
replacements.to: 制作木剑。奖励：5经验值，30个橡木木板，2个碗。

replacements.replace: Gather Diamonds. Spin the wheel to win multiple prizes. Make sure to clear your inventory before playing. These are repeatable quests.
replacements.to: 收集钻石，转动转盘，赢得众多奖励。在玩之前，请确保你的物品栏不是满的。这个任务可以重复完成。
制作1把剪刀。奖励：30经验值。

replacements.replace: Kill Ghasts, Collect 40x Ghast Tears.  Reward: 1000 Exp, 5x Enchanted Golden Apples.
replacements.to: 击杀恶魂，并收集40个恶魂之泪。奖励：1000经验值，5个附魔金苹果。
收集32个金锭。奖励：80经验值。

replacements.replace: (Bonus Extreme Quest) Find and kill The Warden.  Reward: 2000 Exp, 1x Pigstep Music Disc
replacements.to: （额外极限任务）找到监守者并杀掉它。奖励：2000经验值，1个Pigstep唱片。

replacements.replace: Kill Magma Cubes, Collect 10x Magma Cream.  Reward: 150 Exp, 10 Iron Ingots, 2 Chests.
replacements.to: 杀死岩浆怪，并收集10个岩浆膏。奖励：150经验值，10个铁锭，2个箱子。

replacements.replace: Craft various items and gain bonus Experience points. These can be completed in any order.
replacements.to: 制作各种物品并获得额外的经验值。这些任务可以以任意顺序完成。

replacements.replace: Convert 9x Rotten Flesh into 1x Diamond. Stand on a Crafting Table to enable the process and switch between off-hand and main hand to initiate.
replacements.to: 将9个腐肉转化为1颗钻石。站在工作台上在主手和副手之间相互切换腐肉来兑换。

replacements.replace: Complete Quests and receive Experience and Rewards!
replacements.to: 通过完成任务来获得经验和奖励！

replacements.replace: Try your luck and win rare prizes. Entry fee is 5 Diamonds per spin. Stand on a Diamond Block to enable the process and switch between off-hand and main hand to initiate.
replacements.to: 用运气来赢得大奖！每次的花费是5颗钻石，站在钻石块上将钻石在主手和副手之间切换以开始赌局。
制作1个石英块。奖励：85经验值。

replacements.replace: (Final Hard Quest) Find and kill Shulkers, Obtain 2x Shulker Shells.  Reward: 2000 Exp, 30x Diamonds, 15x Enchanted Golden Apples, 1x Netherite Chestplate, 1x Netherite Helmet.
replacements.to: （困难任务完结）寻找且杀死潜影贝，并获得2个潜影壳。奖励：2000经验值，30颗钻石，15个附魔金苹果，1个下界合金胸甲，1个下界合金头盔。
收集9个下界疣。奖励：70经验值。
制造9个骨粉。奖励：50经验值。

replacements.replace: Gather 14x Obisidan blocks.  Reward: 20 Exp, 1x Flint and Steel
replacements.to: 收集14个黑曜石。奖励：20经验值，1个打火石。
制作1个灵魂火把。奖励：100经验值。

replacements.replace: Craft a Wooden Axe.  Reward: 20 Exp, 1x Wooden Shield.
replacements.to: 制作一把木斧。奖励：20经验值，1个木制盾牌。

replacements.replace: Kill Ghasts, Collect 20x Ghast Tears.  Reward: 150 Exp, 1x Warped Fungus on Stick, 5x Lanterns.
replacements.to: 杀死恶魂，并收集20个恶魂之泪。奖励：150经验值，1个诡异菌钓竿，5个灯笼。

replacements.replace: Kill an Axolotl. Reward: 500 Exp, 1x Bucket.
replacements.to: 杀死美西螈。奖励：500经验值，1个铁桶。

replacements.replace: Collect 64x Diamond Blocks.  Reward: 200 Exp, 10x Emerald Blocks, 10x Gold Blocks.
replacements.to: 收集64个钻石块。奖励：200经验值，10个绿宝石块，10个金块。

replacements.replace: (Final Extreme Quest) Kill The Ender Dragon.  Reward: 4000 Exp, 1x Black Bed, 1x Elytra, 25x Lapis Lazuli, 25x Red Mushroom Blocks, 1x Pink Shulker Box, 1x Cyan Shulker Box, 1x Brown Shulker Box.
replacements.to: （最终极限任务）杀死末影龙。奖励：4000经验值，1个黑色床，1个鞘翅，25个青金石，25个红色蘑菇方块，1个粉红色潜影盒，1个青色潜影盒，1个棕色潜影盒。

replacements.replace: Gather 10x Podzol.  Reward: 120 Exp, 50x Pumpkin, 20x Carved Pumpkin.
replacements.to: 收集10个灰化土。奖励：120经验值，50个南瓜，20个雕刻过的南瓜。

replacements.replace: Kill Shulkers, Collect 30x Shulker Shells.  Reward: 280 Exp, 25x Rabbit Stew, 1x Netherite Hoe.
replacements.to: 杀死潜影贝，并收集30个潜影壳。奖励：280经验值，25个兔子脚，1个下界合金锄。

replacements.replace: Kill Magma Cubes, Collect 30x Magma Cream.  Reward: 350 Exp, 25x Glass, 25x Leather.
replacements.to: 击杀岩浆怪，并收集30个岩浆膏。奖励：350经验值，25个玻璃，25个皮革。

replacements.replace: Kill More Spiders, Collect 50x Spider Eyes.  Reward: 500 Exp, 1x Iron Chestplate, 1x Diamond Boots.
replacements.to: 击杀更多蜘蛛，并收集50个蜘蛛眼。奖励：500经验值，1个铁胸甲，1个钻石靴子。

replacements.replace: Catch 64x of each type of Fish (Cod, Salmon, Pufferfish, Tropical).  Reward: 350 Exp, 5x Fishing Rods.
replacements.to: 收集各种各样的鱼各64个（鳕鱼，鲑鱼，河豚，热带鱼）奖励：350经验值，5根钓鱼竿。

replacements.replace: Kill Ghasts, Collect 60x Ghast Tears.  Reward: 2000 Exp, 2x Sea Lanterns.
replacements.to: 杀死恶魂，并收集60个恶魂之泪。奖励：2000经验值，2个海晶灯。

replacements.replace: Fight a Creeper.  Reward: 15 Exp, 1x Chainmail Legging, 1x Chainmail Boots, 5x Beetroot Soup, 1x Bucket.
replacements.to: 击败苦力怕。奖励：15经验值，1个锁链护腿，1个锁链靴子，5碗甜菜汤，1个桶。

replacements.replace: Gather 20x End Stone Bricks.  Reward: 150 Exp, 14x Glass, 2x Eye of the Ender.
replacements.to: 收集20个末地石砖。奖励：150经验值，14个玻璃，2个末影之眼。

replacements.replace: By using the Essence of Eventide on the Old Moon Altar, you will return the true heir back to it's original body. This will result in the summoning of the Fallen Icon, a fierce empowered version of the Returning Knight with a fast and dangerous second phase.
replacements.to: 在破旧的月光祭坛上使用日暮精粹，你将让真正的继承者回归他原本的躯体。这将召唤出陨落王者，它是复仇骑士的凶猛强化版，第二阶段快速且危险。

replacements.replace: Collect 3 bone staff fragments from the Ruins structures. Obtain a bone dagger. Hold a glass bottle in offhand and kill villagers with bone dagger to get Vial of Blood filled up. Find Lich Prison and wait until night. Place bone staff pieces on dark corrupted deepslate blocks front of altar. Pour Vial of Blood into altar to summon Corrupted Champion.
replacements.to: 从废墟结构中收集3块骨杖碎片。获得一把骨头匕首。手持玻璃瓶，用骨头匕首杀死村民，将小血瓶装满。找到巫妖囚笼并等到晚上。将骨杖碎片放在祭坛前的堕落深石方块上。将血瓶倒入祭坛，召唤堕落的英雄。

replacements.replace: Summoned by throwing the Chaos Orb into the sky. Wielding the Dawnbreaker, this goddess is empowered during the day and is slower, but more tankier than her other counterpart. Enraged when Night Prowler is defeated.
replacements.to: 通过向天空投掷混沌宝珠来召唤。挥舞着破晓者，在白天这位女神会被赋予力量，速度较慢，但比她的同伴更抗揍。当夜行者被击败时会被激怒。

replacements.replace: Night Lich, found in rare towers in cold biomes. Locate the towers by following soul stars..
replacements.to: 暗夜巫妖可发现于寒冷生物群系的稀有塔状建筑。跟随着灵魂之星来找寻塔吧……

replacements.replace: The ender dragon spawns after an entity first arrives in the End, along with the bedrock frame for the exit portal.
replacements.to: 在一个实体第一次到达末地之后，末影龙就会生成，同时出现的还有出口传送门的基岩框架。

replacements.replace: A boss spawning in the Old Champion's Graves, this skeleton figure has been possessed by another being, namely The Frenzied Shade. After killing the Old Champion, it will drop the Draugr sword, and the Frenzied Shade will spawn.
replacements.to: 这具骷髅是在古英雄坟墓中出现的Boss，它已被另一名生物--暗夜之影附身。击杀古英雄后，它会掉落德拉格尔，同时暗夜之影也会生成。

replacements.replace: Obsidilith, which appears in rare structures in the end islands..
replacements.to: 黑曜石巨柱出现于末地的稀有结构……

replacements.replace: Void Blossom, appears in rare caves at the bottom of the world. Void lilies will point the way..
replacements.to: 虚空之花出现于世界底部的稀有洞穴中。虚空百合将为你指明方向……

replacements.replace: Nether Gauntlet, which appears in rare structures in the nether..
replacements.to: 下界铁掌出现于下界的稀有结构……

replacements.replace: Magus is summoned by using a Prismatic Effigy. Enter the Glass Ocean by using a Hexblade on the portal..
replacements.to: 使用棱镜之刃（Prismatic Effigy）召唤至尊法师。在传送门上使用咒剑进入琉璃之海（Glass Ocean）……

replacements.replace: The Wither is spawned by placing 4 blocks of soul sand or soul soil in a T shape and putting 3 wither skeleton skulls on top of the three upper blocks.
replacements.to: 将4块灵魂沙或灵魂土摆成T字形，然后将3个凋灵骷髅头颅放在上面3个方块的顶端，就能生成凋灵。

replacements.replace: Defeat The Decaying King, Old Champion's Remains, Frenzied Shade, Returning Knight, Fallen Icon, and Monarch of Chaos.
replacements.to: 击败腐朽的王，古英雄的遗骸，暗夜之影，复仇骑士，陨落王者和混沌君主。
击败至尊法师（Magus The Elemental）

replacements.replace: Wardens do not use standard mob spawning mechanics. They are instead spawned when a player activates naturally generated sculk shriekers four times instead and if there isn't already another warden within 24 blocks of it.
replacements.to: 监守者不使用标准的生物生成机制。相反，当玩家激活四次自然生成的幽匿尖啸体时，如果24格内没有监守者，它就会生成。

replacements.replace: Defeat The Night Lich, Obsidilith, Nether Guantlet, and Void Blossom.
replacements.to: 击败暗夜巫妖，黑曜巨石柱，下界铁掌和虚空之花。

replacements.replace: The Decaying King spawns in the remnants of the Decaying Kingdom in the nether. This cursed monstrosity wields The Darkin Blade, and has many deadly attacks to look out for.
replacements.to: 腐朽之王生成于下界腐朽王国的残念。这只被诅咒的怪物挥舞着暗裔利刃，需要注意他许多致命的攻击方式。

replacements.replace: The Monarch of Chaos is a powerful mage. Additionally, it wears both the Crown of Chaos and the Cape of Chaos, two items that will be dropped upon it's death with the Withered Wabbajack. It can be summoned by using the Shard of Uncertainty (which is dropped by the Wither) on the Blackstone Pedestal block.
replacements.to: 混沌君主是一位强大的法师。此外，它还佩戴着混沌之冠和混沌披肩，这两件物品会随着它的死亡，与凋零的瓦巴杰克一起掉落。它可以通过使用黑石基座上的不确定性的残片（由凋灵掉落）来召唤。

replacements.replace: The Frenzied Shade is a cursed and powerful soul, banished from it's former body, who mistakenly possessed the Old Champion. It flies and can move through any block. At half health the shade duplicates itself, summoning 4 other Frenzied Shades with a quarter of the originals health and only 35% damage, but other than the stats, their attacks and looks will still be the same.
replacements.to: 暗夜之影是一名被诅咒的强大灵魂，它被驱逐出了原来的躯体，错误地附身于古英雄之身。它能飞，能穿过任何方块。当生命值减半时，暗夜之影会复制自己，召唤出另外4名暗夜之影，生命值只有原来的四分之一，伤害也只有原来的35%，但除属性外，它们的攻击和外观都是相同的。

replacements.replace: The Returning Knight is a slow, but hard hitting boss with a few attacks up his sleeve. After killing The Returning Knight, he will drop moonstone, Nightfall, a Lord Soul and the Arkenstone. He can be summoned by using a Lost Soul on the Old Moon Altar.
replacements.to: 复仇骑士是一名速度较慢但攻击力很强的Boss，他有多种攻击方式。击杀复仇骑士后，他会掉落月光石、夜陨、王的灵魂和阿肯宝钻。在破旧的月光祭坛上使用迷失的灵魂可以召唤他。

replacements.replace: Defeat Bosses! Each boss drops experience and items.
replacements.to: 击败这些Boss！每名Boss都会掉落经验和物品。

replacements.replace: Summoned by throwing the Chaos Orb into the sky. Empowered during the night and wielding the Soul Reaper, this goddess is less tanky compared to her sister, but is faster, deadlier and loves to teleport around if certain conditions are met. Enraged when Day Stalker is defeated.
replacements.to: 通过向天空投掷混沌宝珠来召唤。在夜间这位女神被赋予力量，挥舞着灵魂收割者，与她的姐姐相比，她的防御能力较弱，但速度更快，杀伤力更强，如果满足特定条件，她还喜欢四处传送。当昼行者被击败时会被激怒。

replacements.replace: Defeat the Wither, Ender Dragon and Warden.
replacements.to: 击败凋灵，末影龙和监守者。

replacements.replace: DarkSpawn cannot be triggered while slow falling is active...
replacements.to: 由于缓降效果存在，无法将你传送到出生点……

replacements.replace: A dark mage has teleported you to spawn...
replacements.to: 暗黑法师将你传送到了出生点……

replacements.replace: A dark mage has granted your death wish...
replacements.to: 一名暗黑法术赋予了你死亡祝福……

replacements.replace: A dark mage has rewarded you with a selected item! Next random reward in 30 minutes..
replacements.to: 你从暗黑法师那里得到了一个随机物品！下一次随机奖励在30分钟后……

replacements.replace: A dark mage will reward you with a selected random item in 30 minutes..
replacements.to: 暗黑法师将会在30分钟后奖励你一个随机物品……

replacements.replace: Warning If you click here it will void all your trinket slot items
replacements.to: 注意如果你点击了这里，你的饰品栏物品将会被全部清除

replacements.replace: 缓降激活时无法触发随机TP……
replacements.to: 随机传送无法在缓降效果存在时激活……

replacements.replace: 一名暗黑法师将你传送到了一个随机的位置……
replacements.to: 暗黑法师将你传送到了一个随机的地方……

replacements.replace: Place a Diamond Shovel in offhand slot whilst underwater to gain Water Breathing, Speed, Night Vision.
replacements.to: 在水下时，将一把钻石锹放入副手，可以获得水下呼吸、速度以及夜视效果。

replacements.replace: You have been rewarded special login reward items...
replacements.to: 你获得了特殊奖励物品……

replacements.replace: Open the rewards bundle to receive your special login rewards...
replacements.to: 打开奖励袋，领取你的特殊登录奖励……

replacements.replace: A dark mage will clear dropped items in 10 seconds..
replacements.to: 暗黑法师将在10秒后清理掉落物……

replacements.replace: A dark mage will clear dropped items in 10 minutes..
replacements.to: 暗黑法师将在10分钟后清理掉落物……

replacements.replace: A dark mage has cleared dropped items!
replacements.to: 暗黑法师成功清理了掉落物！

replacements.replace: A dark mage will clear dropped items in 1 minute..
replacements.to: 暗黑法师将在1分钟后清理掉落物……

replacements.replace: A dark mage has boosted your jetpack...
replacements.to: 暗黑法师激活了你的喷气背包……

replacements.replace: Place a Diamond Shovel in offhand to boost your jetpack...
replacements.to: 请在副手放置一把钻石锹以激活喷气背包……

replacements.replace: Try your luck and win rewards! Gamble with your XP to win prizes...
replacements.to: 测试你人品的时候到了！用你的经验来赌博，赢取奖品……

replacements.replace: Stand on a Diamond Block, Alternate a Diamond sword between main hand and offhand. Cost is 5 XP Levels per spin. Good Luck!
replacements.to: 站在一个钻石块上，在主手和副手之间交换一把钻石剑。每次旋转转盘的花费是5级。祝你好运！

replacements.replace: Your natural spawnpoint is in the Taiga biome.
replacements.to: 你的初始出生点在针叶林群系。

replacements.replace: Your small frame gives little weight, making it easier to move at the cost of health.
replacements.to: 小个子带来了轻体重，以牺牲生命为代价，使移动变得更加轻便。

replacements.replace: You cannot use chanimail armor, leather armor, and netherite armor because uhh..yes.
replacements.to: 你不能穿锁链盔甲、皮革盔甲和下界合金盔甲，因为... ...对。

replacements.replace: You are unable to hold a shield and deal less damage with projectiles because of how your paws are built.
replacements.to: 由于你的兽爪构造，你无法持盾，造成的远程伤害也降低。

replacements.replace: Whenever your health goes below 4 hearts, you gain a small speed boost
replacements.to: 只要你的生命值低于四颗心，你就会获得一个小小的移速提升。

replacements.replace: You carry a secret stash that no one but you has acccess to. You can access this pouch by using your load hotbar activator key.
replacements.to: 你携带着一个秘密的储物空间，除你之外无人可及。你可以通过设定的热键打开这个袋子。

replacements.replace: You perform a great leap towards the direction you're facing. You also deal more damage while falling.
replacements.to: 朝面朝方向猛冲一次。下落时能造成更多伤害。

replacements.replace: Kitsunes love berries and therefore they cure 4 hunger points and 14.4 saturation points (like the golden carrot) & your diet is restricted to meat, fish, and berries, so you can't really eat vegetables.
replacements.to: 狐狸喜欢吃浆果，所以浆果能回4点饥饿值和14.4点饱和度（和金胡萝卜一样）。你的饮食范围被限制在肉、鱼和浆果内，所以你真没法吃蔬菜。

replacements.replace: You can walk through solid material, except obsidian, crying obsidian, barriers and bedrock, BUT you are unable to phase up or down.
replacements.to: 你能穿过除了黑曜石、哭泣黑曜石、屏障和基岩以外的固体，但是你不能向上或者向下相位移动。

replacements.replace: A small body performing great movements requires a large amount of food!
replacements.to: 一个小小的身体做这么多大动作当然需要消耗大量的食物！

replacements.replace: This race of Spirit Foxes dwell around settlements waiting for for treasure to be left unguarded. Though weak in terms of vitality they use their spiritual power to hide and strengthen their power.
replacements.to: 这种灵狐会在聚居地附近安家，等待疏于看守的宝藏掉落。虽然生命值较低，但它们可以用灵力隐藏身形或增强力量。

replacements.replace: after year of running from the wardens you have learned to mask your self from them.
replacements.to: 常年的追逐让你学会了如何伪装监守者。

replacements.replace: your only hobby that you find interesting is in the deep dark because God hates you in particular.
replacements.to: 你唯一的兴趣爱好就是待在黑暗中，因为上帝特别讨厌你。

replacements.replace: Since you have been down here so long you can use some of the wardens moves.
replacements.to: 因为长时间待在这里所以你可以使用监守者的一些招式。
